כֹּה֮ <WH3541> kōh “ This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> hay·yō·šêḇ Whoever stays בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> bā·‘îr city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ in this יָמ֕וּת <WH4191> yā·mūṯ will die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ba·ḥe·reḇ by sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> bā·rā·‘āḇ and famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> ū·ḇad·dā·ḇer and plague, וְהַיֹּצֵ֤א <WH3318> wə·hay·yō·ṣê but whoever surrenders אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to הַכַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> hak·kaś·dîm the Chaldeans ( That is, the Babylonians; also in verses 18, 19, and 23) יִחְיֶה <WH2421> yiḥ·yɛh will live; וְהָיְתָה־ <WH1961> wə·hā·yə·ṯāh- he will retain לּ֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) נַפְשׁ֛וֹ 5315 N-fsc│3ms ( nap̄·šōw) his life לְשָׁלָ֖ל 7998 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·šā·lāl) like a spoil of war, וָחָֽי׃ס 2421 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wā·ḥāy) and he will live.

כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD הִנָּתֹ֨ן <WH5414> hin·nā·ṯōn will surely be delivered תִּנָּתֵ֜ן <WH5414> tin·nā·ṯên ... הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> hā·‘îr city הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ This בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> bə·yaḏ into the hands חֵ֥יל <WH2428> ḥêl of the army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> bā·ḇel of Babylon, וּלְכָדָֽהּ׃ <WH3920> ū·lə·ḵā·ḏāh and he will capture it. ”

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer replied הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham·me·leḵ King צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH6667> ṣiḏ·qî·yā·hū Zedekiah. הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin·nêh- “ Here ה֖וּא <WH1931> hū he is,” בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> bə·yeḏ·ḵem “ He is in your hands, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- since אֵ֣ין <WH369> ’ên can do nothing הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham·me·leḵ the king יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> yū·ḵal ... אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem - דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> dā·ḇār to stop you.”
